TEXT.English: Done generating files:In mod dir:[NEWLINE] Desync log for player %d1.txt[NEWLINE] Desync save for player %d2.ColonizationSave[NEWLINE]In documents\my games\colonization\logs:[NEWLINE] Random Player %d3.log[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Please collect those files from all players, put them in a single zip file and submit them as an OOS bug report. Add the autosave from the previous turn if possible.

Colony is storing negative amount of cargo.[NEWLINE]Please make a bug report and provide a savegame from just before this happened.[NEWLINE]Be aware that the autosave from this turn might be from after this happened if it happened just as the turn started.
